entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebAuthenticator doesn't support Azure App Service callback response. #11641
  • ListView ViewCell content disappears when the application enters the foreground #11640
  • ToolbarItems do not work correctly on Windows #11639
  • Add Test for RefreshView / Scrolling #11637
    Backlog
  • Add UI Test for NeedsExactMeasure #11636
    Backlog
  • Listview Binding Data not display (in Release) #11617
    Backlog
  • Removing the NavBar causes a white field to appear in its place #11611
    Backlog
  • Cannot use Japanese text in window title if ExtendsContentIntoTitleBar is false (possibly Windows only) #11610
  • [Net8.0] Enable test tamples with net6 and net7 #11608
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Entry Unfocus not working on Android #11606
    Backlog
  • [net8] Review changes related with DisableResizetizer on net branch #11605
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Disabling a MenuBarItem doesn't stop its sub-items from appearing when clicked #11602
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI style problem with gradient colors - Android #11601
    Backlog
  • Crash on Windows when UseMauiCompatibility is not enabled ("The handler's MauiContext cannot be null.") #11600
    Backlog
  • ListView fails to display correct ViewCell content intermittently #11598
    Backlog
  • I think this is a duplicate of #5652 and I think half the time when files are moved in VS the IDE decides it does not want to track the files and adds an explicit remove for everything. #11596
  • Will there be a window control library similar WPF in the future? #11595
  • Image with authentication header #11594
    Backlog

Closed

  • Metatada file "MyApp.dll" could not be found, on all default solutions on Visual Studio Mac #11567
  • MAUI 7.0 iOS Release build won't install on iOS 16 #11385
  • Running on windows 11 doesn't live up to expectations, but Android is right #11547
    Backlog
  • Very slow Intellisense & Code Completion in MAUI projects #11592
  • iOS app crashes after launch for release build distributed via TestFlight #11349
  • .net maui android app crashes when deployed to google play closed testing #11316
  • Android-.NET6-Style issue when changing the button status (disabled->enabled) #11336
  • Created an APK for Android - My phone says "This type of file is not supported" #11391

PullRequests

Created

  • Only include MauiXaml/Css when $(UseMaui)=true #11638
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Connectivity API Docs #11633
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add Shell FlyoutBackDrop #11613
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add handing Label.TextType #11612
  • [Build] Update yaml for net8 #11609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Invalidate Button background drawable if size changes #11604
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Tizen] Add Shell SearchHandler #11597
    community ✨

Merged

  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Battery API Docs #11626
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Clipboard Docs #11634
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials Browser API Docs #11628
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Accelerometer API Docs #11623
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials Clipboard Docs #11635
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Contacts API Docs #11630
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials Connectivity API Docs #11632
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials Contacts API Docs #11631
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Browser API Docs #11629
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials Barometer API Docs #11621
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials AppInfo API Docs #11627
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials Battery API Docs #11625
  • [net7.0] Remove unnecessary MeasureOverride from RefreshView; #11624
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials Accelerometer API Docs #11622
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Barometer API Docs #11620
  • [net7.0] Fix window events when swapping out a page #11618
  • [net7.0] Add NeedsExactMeasure check for Editor on Android #11619
    do-not-merge
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials AppActions API Docs #11615
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Fix issue clearing MapElements in Map #11616
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials AppActions API Docs #11614
  • Manual update for .net8 sdk and workloads #11387
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Exclude incompatible files from daily dotnet format workflow #11590
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Feat: Added "Keyboard.None" #11024
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix crash disconnecting the IndicatorView #11346
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, version/android-13
  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix issue correctly updating WrapperView content visibility #11531
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • Make iOS Label HTML behavior compatible with Forms #11569
    area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11570
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
